title: other team remakes in my promos causes me to lose one game in promos why??
body: why do remade games count in promos as a loss if the other team is surrendering

replies.body:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Contact support and tell them.

Because likelihood is someone touched something they shouldn't have.
what would the request come under?
I guess "I am having technical issues." That's the only one that it might generally fall under. It shouldn't matter too much anyway, once you explain it they will understand.

You can send a ticket. You will most likely just get a 'whoops, * "generic apology" *, cant help you'.

But at least it will be reported and they can look into it so it doesn't happen again.
